p: For single cell encapsulation in the Pickering emulsion, for each of the silica-NH 2 NPs content, two different ratios of oil/water were chosen: 20:80 and 30:70. 10 mg of M. brunneum Ma7-GFP conidia were added to 10 mL of emulsion. The mixture was vortexed at high speed in vortex mixers for 5 min. Cell samples (10 Î¼L) were placed onto a glass slide and analyzed by confocal microscopy.
